xxl.core.functions
Class CountingFunction<P,R>

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.functions.Function<P,R>
      xxl.core.functions.DecoratorFunction<P,R>
          xxl.core.functions.CountingFunction<P,R>
Type Parameters:
P - the type of the function's parameters.
R - the return type of the function.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class CountingFunction<P,R>
extends DecoratorFunction<P,R>

A DecoratorFunction that provides additional information about the number of function calls its inner function.

See Also:
Serialized Form

If you want to be informed on new versions of XXL you can subscribe to our mailing-list.
